overview: Documentary film about the former working class in today's Serbian transitional society. The story takes us into the everyday lives of five former employees of the industrial giants in Zrenjanin, Serbia. Created in the form of a documentary drama the film gives a fresh insight into the fates of the forgotten heroes of the working class - people, who have overcome time, the system, the transition and poverty, and whose tragic life stories are new, modern, authentic and lasting.
title: The Working Class Is Off to Paradise
